aboutMe.description: I am a dedicated B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering student with skills in Java, ReactJs, C++, and Data Structures & Algorithms (DSA). My coursework and self-study have sharpened my keen observation, organization, and communication abilities. As a fast learner with a strong work ethic, I am eager to face new challenges and broaden my knowledge. My aim is to use my technical expertise and theoretical background to contribute to a team's success, while continuously growing professionally and making a positive impact.
